snippet.title: Dwarves Mining Idle - Semi-Idler Indie Game
snippet.description:
Dwarves Mining Idle - Starting with a lonely Dwarf, endlessly mine to gather materials and use them to progress farther. Have more Dwarves join in, craft resources and upgrade literally everything! The mines of the idle Dwarves await you!

Now on Steam!
steampowered.com/app/2220570/Dwarves_Mining_Idle/
